name: Crazy Slots Adventure
description:
Crazy Slots, the most unique casino game, has arrived to the App Store!

Play Crazy Slots, for FREE today!

It is a style of game you may not have seen before; when you first load up the game you will need to choose your favourite fruit or symbol (Orange, Lemon and/or Cherries), after clicking the “Play” button you will see four sets of 3 x 3 reels underneath a track and a single reel with the prize value per symbol. Each of the 3 x 3 reels has five paylines. The symbol are of the traditional variety and include cherries, oranges, lemons, plums, strawberries, melons, stars, sevens and bells.

How to Play

Your first task is to press the “Play” button which will fill the top left reel with three symbols. Now move those symbols into one of the reels below by pressing any of them below. More symbols will automatically appear in the single reel above the slots and you must move each one down until all twelve slots have been filled.
You will have to move the symbols into slots so that they match up with existing symbols and create winning paylines. The game will hint you here by flashing the symbols in the slots where a win could be likely. Once a Slot is filled points are awarded for three of the same symbol on any of the win lines below. Once 12 combinations have been place the total number of points is totalled. If sufficient points (100 or over) have been won, the prize will be paid.

Bonus Features
•• 9 Alike
If nine of the same symbols are present in a Slot, bonus points are awarded.
•• 3 Winning Sets
If three of the Slots contain a winning combination the total points are multiplied x1.5.
•• 4 Winning Sets
If four of the Slots contain a winning combination the total points are x2.
•• Crazy Slots Feature
If three “Crazy Slots” symbols are on a win line, the Crazy Feature begins. This is a series of consecutive wins given on in that Slot. The points awarded from this win series count towards the game total.

You will have the chance to spin for a reward on the big wheel every time you level up.
Unlock new characters, new worlds, more coins, etc. Good luck!
